dict.acceptation: 野生的；野蛮的；狂热的；荒凉的；
荒野；未开化的地方；偏远地区；人烟稀少的地区；

sent.orig: With the wild simulated wild-simulated method, seeds are planted thinly in the forrest forest.
sent.trans: 用模拟野生的方法，把种子薄薄地种在森林里。

sent.orig: He hunted a wild pig, grew vegetables in his garden and searched for wild mushrooms.
sent.trans: 他猎获到一头野猪，在自己的菜园里中蔬菜，寻找野蘑菇。

sent.orig: With the wild simulated wild-simulated method, seeds are planted thinly in the forest.
sent.trans: 使用仿野生的方法，种子被稀疏地种植在森林里。

sent.orig: When she gathered wild herbs, they discovered that wild herbs were exactly what they needed most.
sent.trans: 小芹上树采野菜，马上青年们也都去采。

sent.orig: John in the wilderness eat wild fruit, leaves the hive to drink wild honey.
sent.trans: 约翰在旷野常吃野果，喝点蜂房上留下的野蜂蜜。
